ğ“Šƒğ“¡ğ“‚‹ ZurvÃ£n(saturn) Venus as a boy! VAN:1th/5th planet (Zoroastrians) Janus deep  
Zoroastrians of ancient Persia knew Saturn as the heaven-sustaining ZurvÃ£n  
ZurvÃ£n "the King and Lord of the Long Dominion."  
Kronos is presented as the father and Zeus as his son who dethrones him.  
â‡” Sabbath â‡” Seth? / Saturni dies, "Saturn's day."  
The same day passed into the Anglo-Saxon calendar as the "day of Seater" !!  
Distinguished it from our Sun by calling it best sun, the primeval sun, the central sun.
